name: UFO: Unidentified Fishing Opportunity
description:
Life used to be simple... You were just a fish swimming through the ocean, not a care in the world, until that giant fish-munching monster showed up.

You swam as fast as you could, though he was faster. You weren't going to survive and you thought it was the end, but then the aliens showed up! They began stealing water and objects from the ocean, and you get pulled up into one of their tractor beams before the monster can gobble you up.

You're now stuck in the middle - you don't want the aliens to steal you away, and you don't want to go back into the water where that monster is waiting for you. Guess all there is to do is surf these tractor beams for as long as you can!

Controls:

A   + D - swim left and right

W + S - swim up the tractor beam or resist it's pull (as much as you can anyway)

Space - do a little fish-powered jump
